recommended_degree: Informatika, Sistem Informasi, Teknik Telekomunikasi, Teknik Elektro, Teknik Komputer Dan Jaringan (Sarjana)
job_description:
-  Responsible to support data analysis team to build and maintain database for Telco MS operations use base.
-  Ensure quality of the database, using existing development system in Huawei.
-  Responsible for translating from digitalization requirements to automation function, after collecting user requirement.
-  Work out solution design as per biz user requirements, proceed function tests and complete UAT.
-  Support requirements collection and output business requirements document, and get user signed off. 
-  Manage the applications, tools into operations, keep improvements and maintain the applications works.
-  Collaborate with cross functional team to define and design the app and Perform checks on correct functionality of app.
-  Integrate application with backend tools such as cloud, APIs and push notifications.
-  Use encryption tools to safeguard content and can develop with PHP, C & Java programming.
